amc_info.name: Aditya Birla Sun Life Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: One World Center, Tower 1, 17th Floor, Jupiter Mill CompoundSenapati Bapat Marg, Elphinstone Road Mumbai 400013
amc_info.description: Birla Sun Life Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 23/12/1994 and its managing total assets of â‚¹2,24,938 Cr. Its ranked at 4 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2017.
amc_info.more_description:
Aditya Birla Sun Life Mutual Funds is one of the best and biggest asset management companies in India. It has a strong presence across the financial industry and has more than 16,000 employees working under it.

They have four main visions that they aspire to achieve. The first being a leader in the mutual fund industry, rather than just being another competitor. The second is to be a role model by being the best in whatever they do. The third is to be a broad-based player to meet all the needs of their customers and the last is to become an integrated player to garner a competitive edge in the market.

Aditya Birla Sun Life Mutual Fund offers various mutual fund schemes across various categories and sub- categories. An investor can choose the particular fund he/she wants to invest in based on their financial goals.

category_info.category_helper_text: Invests in stocks as per Contrarian investment strategy
category_info.tax_impact: If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.
category_info.description: Contra funds follow Contrarian strategy which means investing in stocks in contrast to the prevailing sentiment. Minimum investment in equity is 65%.

fund_manager_details.education: Mr. Bameta has done B.Tech (IIT Kanpur), CFA Charterholder (CFA Institute, USA)
fund_manager_details.experience: Prior to joining Aditya Birla Sun Life Mutual Fund as an Analyst, Fixed Income. He was the Head of Research in Forex and Rates Desk at Edelweiss Securities Limited, covering global and Indian forex markets and economies. He was also associated with Quant Capital for 6 years as an Economist and was covering Indian and global economy and markets.
